body:
Ok I am sick and tired of this. It ruins the game and therefore it should he punishable. Or if it stays there should be some classes that can counter it. That's my view on it.


Thanks, CreeperJoe62
body_tagged:

title: CtH ninja glitch

replies.body:
+1.
It gives ninja's an advantage that is way too overpowered.

If you guys don't know what he's talking about, he is referring to the issue where ninja's are able to take their boots off.
replies.body_tagged:
+1.
It gives ninja's an advantage that is way too overpowered.

If you guys don't know what he's talking about, he is referring to the issue where ninja's are able to take their boots off.

replies.body: I've tried to punish players for it. I've been  told it's not allowed but it's not punishable. I don't agree with that rule... If players know it's not punishable they're not going to listen.
replies.body_tagged: I've tried to punish players for it. I've been  told it's not allowed but it's not punishable. I don't agree with that rule... If players know it's not punishable they're not going to listen.

replies.body: Omg so truueee!!! I dont even know WHY they made it so you could take arnour off....this is BS!! Please make it so you cant take armour off in cth.
replies.body_tagged: Omg so truueee!!! I dont even know WHY they made it so you could take arnour off....this is BS!! Please make it so you cant take armour off in cth.

replies.body: Nuclear they didn't make it like that it's just a glitch :p

replies.body:
Wha..then that just denies the name of it being called Ninja. LOL. Ninjas are meant to be super stealth. They should be allowed to take of boots. I mean why call it "Ninja" when you can be seen.

I mean that's so lame. The point of the kit being able to do something like that is for it to be fun. It's also very easy killing people who are invisible.

A tip would be to just look for sprint Particles
